snippet: Trojan Vibrations, a line of sexual enhancement devices, will hand out 10,000 free vibrators in Manhattan from two hot dog carts identified as pleasure carts.
abstract: Andrew Adam Newman Advertising column notes Trojan Vibrations, a line of sexual enhancement devices from Church & Dwight, will hand out 10,000 free vibrators in Manhattan from two hot dog carts identified as pleasure carts.
lead_paragraph: Trojan Vibrations, a line of sexual enhancement devices, will hand out 10,000 free vibrators in Manhattan from two hot dog carts identified as pleasure carts.

headline.seo: Trojan Vibrations Giveaways in Manhattan, via Hot Dog Carts
headline.main: A Surprise in a Hot Dog Cart
